CanvasRenderingContext2DWordSpacing.summary: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.wordSpacing property of the Canvas API specifies the spacing between words when drawing text.

remarks.para: This corresponds to the CSS word-spacing property.

CanvasRenderingContext2DWordSpacing.value:
The word spacing as a string in the CSS length data format.
The default is 0px.The property can be used to get or set the spacing.
The property value will remain unchanged if set to an invalid/unparsable value.
